data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 10,058,100 people living in Gauteng through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Gauteng, South Africa
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 2,114,253 believers in Gauteng to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Gauteng, South Africa with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Gauteng to agree with you and with one another.
Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Somali people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Spirit, fill the 10,058,100 souls living in the state of Gauteng with a taste for your Word. Make it sweet as honey in their mouth.
data.verse: How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 2,114,253 believers in Gauteng to start simple multiplying churches in their homes.

data.section_summary:
the state of Gauteng, South Africa has a population of 10,058,100.

We estimate Gauteng has 2,114,253 people who might know Jesus, 5,636,268 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,307,580 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 4 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, make the 5,636,268 people in the state of Gauteng who claim to know you, brave enough to let the Bible weigh their thoughts and intentions today.
data.verse: For the word of God is living and powerful, and sharper than any two-edged sword, piercing even to the division of soul and spirit, and of joints and marrow, and is a discerner of the thoughts and intents of the heart.
